data.title: Ms Pooja Sharma
images: https://timess3spore.s3.amazonaws.com/ndata/media/CounsellorWebp/2e1529fbc40d488682f341a56da82ceeBlue and Orange Modern Organic School Admission Instagram Post-min.webp
data.meta_description: Miss Pooja Sharma holds a master's degree in general psychology and is a certified career counsellor cum career coach. She is working as a career counsellor and study abroad counsellor in her institute 'New Age Career Consultancy'. She is well aware of the challenges in selecting the right career so she spreads awareness about new emerging fields and guides others to reach their maximum potential in life.
data.text:
Miss Pooja Sharma is a devoted career counsellor and counselling psychologist. She has a passion for counselling and guiding others for their highest good. She dedicates ample time to learning more about new emerging career fields to guide others to the best. After hitting rock bottom in life she herself rose like a phoenix after getting a career counselling session.

She is aware of the importance of career counselling and guidance and does her best to be a beacon of light to those who feel lost on their way to success. She completed her certifications from ISCHS Bangalore in September 2022 began her own unique journey and is moving forward. Also, she has noticed a significant rise in anxiety and fear among youngsters and parents regarding the career selection process and she does her best to bring awareness to individuals as well as parents.

In this era of cut-throat competition it's difficult to rely on Google and school teachers for career guidance and selection as individuals are limited to few options and Google talks about all those fields that may or may not serve you well in the future so to solve this issue Miss Pooja uses A.I. based psychometric assessments which guides a person not in just understanding themselves better but also in choosing long term career satisfaction. She hopes to guide as many students and professionals as she can.
